text: (jnapakam cesukondi) appudu allah ila annadu: "O isa! Nenu ninnu tisukuntanu mariyu ninnu na vaipunaku ettukuntanu mariyu satyatiraskarula nundi ninnu sud'dhaparustanu mariyu ninnu anusarincina varini, punarut'thana dinam varaku satyatiraskarulaku paiceyiga undetatlu cestanu. Civaraku miranta na vaddake marali ravalasi undi. Appudu nenu mi madhya talettina vibhedalanu gurinci tirpu cestanu
